metadata.name: Step into the light
metadata.description:
When the man saw himself in the midst of a rebellious nature, he felt a deep loneliness.
He was scared and his naked body was trembling.
He had just been cast out of heaven;
His eyes did not see anything
and his ears did not hear anything.
He could only feel the relentless chaos around him.

He had to find a shelter for himself to be safe from the fierce forces that surrounded him.
But there was no refuge:
Those forces were flowing in his veins
He was breathing that "intensity". 

So he tried to open his eyes and see and recognize that terrible storm.
He understood that he must be unified with that chaos,
Realized that light must rotate in order to align with everything.

He listened to the sounds around him and the secrets were slowly revealed to him.
So he accepted death and surrendered himself to profound silence.
The silence that was the beginning of life; 

He saw the first sign...
